newsitem.title: POLAND: Flooded Rafako restarting date unknown.
newsitem.headline: Flooded Rafako restarting date unknown.

text.p: Industrial boilermaker Rafako SA said on Monday it did not yet know when it would be able to resume production after floods struck its plant in Raciborz, southern Poland.

"On July 14, Rafako SA is without gas, water or electric energy. Computers and ground communication lines are not functioning. The whole plant was flooded in water up to 2.5 metres deep," the company said in a statement.
"Today it is not yet possible to say when the company will begin production. The damage to power lines and basic machines has not been fully diagnosed," the company said. @
Rafako is among seven companies so far suspended on the Warsaw Stock Exchange after being hit by the week-old floods.
